ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She smiled at him.  She looked into his deep, hypnotic eyes and fell into them.  She didn t see anyone else around them, she didn t see the ship, the war

::Shadow Wing:;

She smiled at him.  She looked into his deep, hypnotic eyes and fell 
into them.  She didn't see anyone else around them, she didn't see 
the ship, the war around them, all she saw was him.  He filled her 
eyes. And filled her spark.  She smiled and didn' want to stop 
holding him, or him holding her.  She felt warm and safe in his arms, 
and never wanted that to stop.
